contents.subject: Bible Stories
contents.description: 50 key stories of the Bible, from Creation to Revelation, for evangelism & discipleship, in text, audio, and video, on any mobile phone, in any language, for free. It increases understanding of the historical and redemptive narrative of the entire Bible.

subcontents.name: যাত্ৰাপুস্তক অৰ্থাৎ মোচিয়ে লিখা দ্বিতীয় পুস্তক।
লেবীয়া পুস্তক অৰ্থাৎ মোচিয়ে লিখা তৃতীয় পুস্তক
গণনাপুস্তক অৰ্থাৎ মোচিয়ে লিখা চতুৰ্থ পুস্তক।
যিহোচূৱাক দিয়া যিহোৱাৰ আজ্ঞা আৰু লোকসকলক দিয়া যিহোচূৱাৰ আদেশ

contents.name: Translation Notes
contents.subject: Translation Notes
contents.description: Open-licensed exegetical notes that provide historical, cultural, and linguistic information for translators. It provides translators and checkers with pertinent, just-in-time information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: Translation Questions
contents.subject: Translation Questions
contents.description: Comprehension and theological questions for each chapter of the Bible. It enables translators and translation checkers to confirm that the intended meaning of their translations is clearly communicated to the speakers of that language.

contents.name: Translation Words
contents.subject: Translation Words
contents.description: A basic Bible lexicon that provides translators with clear, concise definitions and translation suggestions for every important word in the Bible. It provides translators and checkers with essential lexical information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: Open Bible Stories (OBS)
contents.subject: Bible Stories
contents.description: Bangali translation of 50 key stories of the Bible, from Creation to Revelation, for evangelism & discipleship. It increases understanding of the historical and redemptive narrative of the entire Bible.

contents.name: OBS translationNotes
contents.subject: Translation Notes
contents.description: Bengali translation of open-licensed exegetical notes providing historical, cultural, and linguistic information for translators. It provides translators and checkers with pertinent, just-in-time information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: OBS translationQuestions
contents.subject: Translation Questions
contents.description: Bengali translation of comprehension and theological questions for Open Bible Stories. It enables translators and translation checkers to confirm that the intended meaning of their translations is clearly communicated to the speakers of that language.

subcontents.name: করিন্থীয়দের প্রতি প্রেরিত পৌলের প্রথম পত্র।
করিন্থীয়দের জন্য প্রেরিত পৌলের দ্বিতীয় পত্র।
থিষলনীকীয়দের প্রতি প্রেরিত পৌলের প্রথম পত্র।
থিষলনীকীয়দের প্রতি প্রেরিত পৌলের দ্বিতীয় পত্র।
তীমথিয়ের প্রতি প্রেরিত পৌলের প্রথম পত্র।
তীমথিয়ের প্রতি প্রেরিত পৌলের দ্বিতীয় পত্র।

contents.name: unfoldingWord® Open Bible Stories
contents.subject: Bible Stories
contents.description: Unrestricted visual Bible stories–50 key stories of the Bible, from Creation to Revelation, in text, audio, and video, in any language, for free. It increases understanding of the historical and redemptive narrative of the entire Bible.

contents.name: unfoldingWord® Open Bible Stories Translation Notes
contents.subject: Translation Notes
contents.description: Open-licensed exegetical notes that provide historical, cultural, and linguistic information for translators. It provides translators and checkers with pertinent, just-in-time information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: unfoldingWord® Open Bible Stories Translation Questions
contents.subject: Translation Questions
contents.description: Comprehension and theological questions for unfoldingWord® Open Bible Stories. It enables translators and translation checkers to confirm that the intended meaning of their translations is clearly communicated to the speakers of that language.

contents.name: unfoldingWord® Literal Text
contents.subject: Bible
contents.description: An open-licensed update of the ASV, intended to provide a 'form-centric' understanding of the Bible. It increases the translator's understanding of the lexical and grammatical composition of the underlying text by adhering closely to the word order and structure of the originals.

contents.name: unfoldingWord® Simplified Text
contents.subject: Bible
contents.description: An open-licensed translation, intended to provide a 'functional' understanding of the Bible. It increases the translator's understanding of the text by translating theological terms as descriptive phrases.

contents.name: unfoldingWord® OBS Study Questions
contents.subject: OBS Study Questions
contents.description: Open-licensed exegetical questions that guide discussions about the Open Bible Stories.

contents.name: unfoldingWord® OBS Study Notes
contents.subject: OBS Study Notes
contents.description: Open-licensed exegetical study notes that help people understand the Open Bible Stories.

contents.name: Translation Words

contents.name: Translation Notes
contents.subject: Translation Notes
contents.description: Open-licensed exegetical notes that provide historical, cultural, and linguistic information for translators. It provides translators and checkers with pertinent, just-in-time information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: Translation Questions
contents.subject: Translation Questions
contents.description: Comprehension and theological questions for each chapter of the Bible. It enables translators and translation checkers to confirm that the intended meaning of their translations is clearly communicated to the speakers of that language.

contents.name: Translation Words
contents.subject: Translation Words
contents.description: A basic Bible lexicon that provides translators with clear, concise definitions and translation suggestions for every important word in the Bible. It provides translators and checkers with essential lexical information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: Open Bible Stories (OBS)
contents.subject: Bible Stories
contents.description: Open Bible Stories

contents.name: Translation Notes
contents.subject: Translation Notes
contents.description: Notes to help translators of the Bible

contents.name: Translation Questions
contents.subject: Translation Questions
contents.description: Comprehension questions for checking Bible translations

contents.name: Translation Words
contents.subject: Translation Words
contents.description: A basic Bible lexicon that provides translators with clear, concise definitions and translation suggestions for every important word in the Bible. It provides translators and checkers with essential lexical information to help them make the best possible translation decisions.

contents.name: Vietnamese Unlocked Dynamic Bible
contents.subject: Bible
contents.description: An unrestricted literal Bible

contents.name: Open Bible Stories (OBS)
contents.subject: Bible Stories
contents.description: 50 key stories of the Bible, from Creation to Revelation, for evangelism & discipleship, in text, audio, and video, on any mobile phone, in any language, for free. It increases understanding of the historical and redemptive narrative of the entire Bible.
